title: Sweet Cherry Chapstick
description: SOCCER SWEETHEART includes:► Raspberries and a Cherry Tree, the chapter that started it all...► Sweet Cherry Chapstick, the second and most romantic installment in the sequence. Sweet Cherry Chapstick is a breathtaking YA about the emotional upheaval that only true love can cause, a love made up of exclusive, overpowering feelings, a totalizing emotion, complete in and of itself, that turns your legs to jelly and leaves you breathless, driving your heart to pound out of bounds.* Limited edition! Teen & Young Adult > Contemporary > Romance
author: Mirella Muffarotto
